scripts.test:backend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm test-backend-unit npm test
scripts.test:frontend: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm test-frontend-unit npm test
scripts.test:e2e: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build backend-test frontend test-e2e --abort-on-container-exit
scripts.test:docker:all: npm run test:docker:unit && npm run test:docker:e2e
scripts.test:docker:unit: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build test-backend-unit test-frontend-unit --abort-on-container-exit
scripts.test:docker:e2e: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build backend-test frontend test-e2e --abort-on-container-exit
scripts.test:docker:clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down -v && rm -rf test-results
